titleStmt.title: Exceeding joyfull nevves from Darby: declaring how Endimion Porter was taken at the grange neere Westhallum within 5. miles of Darby, on the 15. day of Septemb. 1642. Also the taking of Sr. Iohn Watson, neer Hartford, with the true proceedings at Bristow, Bath Warwicke, Boston, Yorke shire, Northumberland, Darby-shire, Cheshire, and Northampton-shire. With a true information of his Majesties removall from Nottingham to Darby. Likewise how the cavaliers made an attempt against Boston, but was opposed by the country, 14. slaine and three taken prisners. Also a true declaration how the Welshmen was driven out of Cheshire, by the forces under the command of the Earle of Essex.

Exceeding joyfull nevves from Darby: declaring how Endimion Porter was taken at the grange neere Westhallum within 5. miles of Darby, on the 15. day of Septemb. 1642. Also the taking of Sr. Iohn Watson, neer Hartford, with the true proceedings at Bristow, Bath Warwicke, Boston, Yorke shire, Northumberland, Darby-shire, Cheshire, and Northampton-shire. With a true information of his Majesties removall from Nottingham to Darby. Likewise how the cavaliers made an attempt against Boston, but was opposed by the country, 14. slaine and three taken prisners. Also a true declaration how the Welshmen was driven out of Cheshire, by the forces under the command of the Earle of Essex.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
